Title: Implement Sitemap, Helmet & Structured Data
Labels: seo,technical

Summary:
Create issues to generate sitemap, install `react-helmet-async`, and add structured data snippets described in `SEO_IMPLEMENTATION.md`.

Checklist:
- [ ] Add `react-helmet-async` to `client` deps and wrap app with `HelmetProvider`
- [ ] Generate `public/sitemap.xml` (script or manual) and submit to Search Console
- [ ] Add Organization, Course, and Article schema snippets to SEO component
